title: WHERE DID MAH TEDDY BEAR GO?
body: So like in this latest patch, my summoner Icon changed from one teddy bear, to a teddy bear on fire. I then looked at the icons to change it and guess what? THE OG TEDDY BEAR AIN'T EVEN THERE. What's with that Riot?

replies.body:
They are changing all the old stuff. I think they should leave the old ones for older accounts, but only give new accounts the new ones.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/1216-pbe-update.html
